    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Neutralising acid using alkali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutralisierende Säure mit Alkali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acide neutralisant en utilisant l'alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ácido neutralizando usando o alcalóide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acido neutralizzante usando alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξουδετερώνοντας οξύ που χρησιμοποιεί το αλκάλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ácido que neutraliza usando el álcali</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the acid is slowly neutralised by using an alkali (sodium hydroxide) in increasing amount.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Säure langsam 
neutralisiert wird, indem man ein Alkali (Natriumhydroxid) in 
zunehmender Menge verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'acide est 
lentement neutralisé en utilisant un alcali (hydroxyde de sodium) 
dans la quantité croissante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o ácido é 
neutralizado lentamente usando um alcalóide (hydroxide do sodium) em 
uma quantidade crescente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'acido è 
neutralizzato lentamente usando un alcali (idrossido del sodio) 
nell'importo aumentante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το οξύ 
εξουδετερώνεται αργά με τη χρησιμοποίηση ενός αλκαλίου 
(υδροξείδιο νατρίου) στο αυξανόμενο ποσό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el ácido es 
neutralizado lentamente usando un álcali (hidróxido del sodio) en 
cantidad de aumento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
